name: Global Congress & Expo on Advancements of Laser, Optics & Photonics 2019
content: Linkin Science, welcomes you all to the “Global Congress & Expo on Advancements of Laser, Optics & Photonics 2019”, with the theme “Insight into the Applications & Innovative Technologies in Laser, Optics & Photonics” which will be hosted in Valencia, Spain during march 25th-27th 2019
